text: Andrzej Sermak (born 29 November 1962) is a retired Polish football midfielder.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Victoria Jaworzno players Category:Ruch Chorzów players Category:Hutnik Nowa Huta players Category:GKS Katowice players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Andrzej Sermak
